snippet.title: Super Mario Gravity - New Demo Release
snippet.description:
*Download:*
v1.1: https://drive.google.com/file/d/1A4lclP7Ut0ctTE5_l0wTmQAi0RsFlPTz/view?usp=sharing

*Credits*
Music:
----------
Composed by @trinketstoadsymphony2070 , @Solargress  and @linusolssonmusic 
Beat Data Import by @zyphrong.3695 

Check out a playlist with the composers of the respective song here!:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=DcAsapeXbBg&list=PLPa-TS0AOciX7Ig7i1IUy957NlmLs1S3_
And for the Main Theme see here:
https://youtu.be/pYgnAF8GB4U?si=bYNkQAJ3sxmsFYRr

ASM/Custom Code by:
-------------------------------------
@evanbowl:  Red Coins, Power Star Spawner
"Someone": Power Star Spawner
Marionumber1 & @AurumNMG : Flying Star Restore
Shibbo: "Syati" Code Loader
@zyphrong.3695  : New Save File Level Select Patch (Makes the game load Mario's Apartment and not Peach's Castle on game start) 


Game Testers
-----------------------
Yannis: Game Tester
@evanbowl  : Patch Tester
@Shadow64  : Patch Tester


Mod Creation
----------------------
By Louis Miles: Levels, Graphics, Models, Textures, ideas and story


*Special Thanks*
-To the Super Mario Galaxy Modding community for help with game issues/crashes and more!
-To all Galaxy Modding Tool Developers for creating awesome tools!
-To all patch creators and coders for creating awesome patches/custom code!
-To all Galaxy dataminers and documenters for providing useful information and creating tutorials!
-To @MrL314 for help and rework of a python script that helped with translation automation!
-To YOU for playing! :)



*Links:*
Thread: https://gbatemp.net/threads/super-mario-gravity-smg2-mod.537951/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/LouisMiles99
Discord Channel: https://discord.gg/vs8N8Y6TKw




*OLD*
V1.0:
https://drive.google.com/file/d/1eeY5SWU9GGogAVPnKq-_e-pAZZEsEs8V/view?usp=sharing
